document_data.name: Blue Baldric
document_data.basicrefs: {{Cite web/Candlekeep forum/Questions for Ed Greenwood (2012)/The Blue Baldric and Lace Harp}}
document_data.mainbody: The '''Blue Baldric''' was a beauty shop and nightclub located in the city of [[Waterdeep]] during the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The Blue Baldric was located in the northeast section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Castle Ward|Castle Ward]] along [[Bazaar Street]], being the middle building of a block that was bounded by Bazaar Street, [[Lamp Street]], the [[Street of the Sword]], and [[Warrior's Way]].
document_data.Services: During the day the Blue Baldric operated as sort of beauty shop during the day and a club at a night. During daylight hours they additionally offered "pampering" in the form of scented bathes alongside servings of [[wine]].
